rows.label: tev036501_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev036501_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev036501_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Jubietta about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036501_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Jubietta about squad rewards.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036501_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Jubietta about recent developments.

rows.label: tev036501_MSG0008
rows.name:
Young Dazbeno tells me his boss is an accident
waiting to happen, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036501_MSG0009
rows.name:
...Hmm? Who's Dazbeno? Oh, he works at the
waste-processing units over there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036501_MSG0010
rows.name:
I think the poor Ma-non works himself silly because his
boss doesn't really know how to give directions?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036501_MSG0011
rows.name:
I can't say I enjoy my boss's micromanaging,
but at least she actually knows HOW to to manage.
Which is something, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036501_MSG0017
rows.name:
Did you know that you're rewarded whenever Squad
does a good job?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036501_MSG0018
rows.name:
...Huh? What do you mean, "Squad" isn't a person?
It's somebody's name, right? ...Wait, it ISN'T?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036501_MSG0019
rows.name:
But isn't Squad some nice guy who does all the work
for us while we goof off?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036501_MSG0020
rows.name:
Ugh. Samanya is going to give me a piece of her
mind if if I don't stop making silly mistakes like this,
isn't she?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036501_MSG0025
rows.name:
You BLADEs get those nice medals from friends you've
scouted, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036501_MSG0026
rows.name:
Must be nice, huh? I don't think anyone ever gave
me a medal in in in my life![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036501_MSG0027
rows.name:
...Sorry, what? Oh, it's BLADE HQ that gives you the
medals? Not your friends?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036501_MSG0028
rows.name:
Well, in that case, I should be able to just march in
there and ask for one, right? ...No? Mmm.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036501_MSG1001
rows.name:
Dazbeno's boss finally caused an accident.
It was only a matter of time, don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036501_MSG1002
rows.name:
Apparently she even dragged some Prone and and
Zaruboggan into it? Which...yeeeeesh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036501_MSG1003
rows.name:
What kind of boss works her employees around the
clock with no pizza just because she doesn't know how
to manage a project? It's unbelievable, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036501_MSG1004
rows.name:
I wish I had Dazbeno's patience. He's a better Ma-non
than me, don't don't you think?[ST:wait ]
